reminder_message:
Hi Akanksha,

This is a friendly reminder about your upcoming appointment with Dr. Rajesh Kumar, Cardiologist, at Ruby Hall on July 8th at 3:05 PM.  Your appointment ID is DEBUG_APT2476A776.

To help ensure a smooth visit, please arrive 15 minutes early.  For your cardiology appointment, it's helpful if you can bring a list of your current medications, including dosages.

We look forward to seeing you!

Warmly,

The Ruby Hall Team
